experience.description:
Rewriting old admin system from scratch.The development team had 2 frontend developers, 1 backend developer and 3 QA. The project main goal was creating a new application with full support of old features and gradual rewriting to new technologies. 
 
Responsibilities: 
• Developing frontend features and common UI kit 
• Integrating partners AT&T, BT, TELUS, etc. 
• Cross-browser, responsive, fluid layout creating 
• Set up and support monorepo 
 
Achievements: 
• Migrating project from Javascript to Typescript 
• Integrating GraphQL with automated type generation for typescript 
• Rewrite all React components to React Hooks 
 
Technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Redux, Jest, Webpack, GraphQL, 
Lerna

The development team had 3 frontend developers and 2 backend developers (Ruby on Rails). We developed 4 projects from scratch and support old projects. 
 
Responsibilities: 
• Development of architectural solutions 
• Tech stack planning 
• Project structure development 
• Configured CI 
• Task decomposition. 
Achievements: 
• Updated the project to modern frontend stack 
• Develop a drag-and-drop system. 
 
Technologies: JavaScript, Webpack, Babel, React, Redux, Sass

Software engineering firm, with about 12,900 employees. 
internship. 
 
Responsibilities: 
• Internship at a banking project. 
Achievements: 
• Improve skills as backend developer. 
 
Technologies: Java, Spring

Thumbtack is an outsourcing company. The company employs more than 200 developers. Their customers are companies such as The New York Times, Oxford University Press, Penton, Tinkoff Digital. 
 
Responsibilities: 
• Development backend for event planning system. 
 
Achievements: 
• Project development from scratch. 
 
Technologies: Java, Spring
